programme.title: Bloody Bites
programme.desc: A compilation of snack-sized horror films to disturb genre fans across the world.

programme.title: Bloody Bites
programme.desc: Sisters go toe-to-toe because of a big mind-controlling leech creature puppeteering them; a coed goes mad after picking a booger he cant flick away.

programme.title: Bloody Bites
programme.desc: A woman scared of the dark plays a game that can cure her fears; demons should be ignored, for they feed on attention.

programme.title: Onyx the Fortuitous and the Talisman of Souls
programme.desc: Fledgling occultist Onyx and a group of worshipers attend a once-in-a-lifetime ritual at the mansion of their idol, Bartok the Great.

programme.title: Onyx the Fortuitous and the Talisman of Souls

programme.title: The Banshee Chapter
programme.desc: Anne investigates the links between her friend's disappearance, a secret government chemical and an odd radio broadcast with an unknown origin.

programme.title: The Ward
programme.desc: No one believes the claims of a young woman (Amber Heard) that a dead patient is stalking the residents of the psychiatric facility.

programme.title: Pennywise: The Story of It
programme.desc: Looking back on the creation of the 1990 horror miniseries adapted from Stephen King's novel, and featuring Tim Curry as the child-eating clown Pennywise.

programme.title: RoboDoc: The Creation of RoboCop
programme.desc: A deep dive into the making of the sci-fi masterpiece 'RoboCop.'

programme.title: RoboDoc: The Creation of RoboCop
programme.desc: With the production in full swing, director Paul Verhoeven is pushing the envelope and many people's buttons; the shoot is heating up, and with the unprecedented filming conditions, the cast and crew are pushed to their limits.

programme.title: RoboDoc: The Creation of RoboCop
programme.desc: Featuring first-hand accounts from the cast and crew, as they relive the golden era of hands-on, practical filmmaking in the 1980s.

programme.title: RoboDoc: The Creation of RoboCop
programme.desc: "The Creation of RoboCop" shows the franchise's impact on the action and science fiction genres, blazing a trail alongside "The Terminator," into the technologically driven cinema scape we see today.

programme.title: The Banshee Chapter
programme.desc: Anne investigates the links between her friend's disappearance, a secret government chemical and an odd radio broadcast with an unknown origin.

programme.title: The Ward
programme.desc: No one believes the claims of a young woman (Amber Heard) that a dead patient is stalking the residents of the psychiatric facility.

programme.title: Night of the Living Dead
programme.desc: A ragtag group of Pennsylvanians barricade themselves in an old farmhouse to remain safe from a horde of flesh-eating ghouls that are ravaging the United States.
